data.text: @YouAreLobbyLud I am alarmed to hear of Miss D’s situation, but have great faith that she is in safest hands of yourself and Tom

@YouAreLobbyLud Dullard is right, her post makes no sense - chart shows masking against unmasked infected person nowhere near complete protection while masked infected person protects everyone. The chart that she chose contradicts her stupid selfish words - apologies if I sound hysterical 😡
@DarylTractor It sure is. I literally breathe a sigh of relief every day that I no longer have any.
@YouAreLobbyLud Why did she even and "and others" 🙄
@YouAreLobbyLud It’s also a really unfortunate time to own kids under 5. https://t.co/tAv3rnMZes
@ClaireS___ @YouAreLobbyLud If I said what I thought I’d get banned.
@YouAreLobbyLud @NobodyImpawtant Selfish dullard is tame compared to what I said when I read that.
@YouAreLobbyLud Selfish dullard exactly. You cut through like nobody David. 💥

@YouAreLobbyLud Poor kid - it must be so tough for her. I will continue to wear my mask for a long time (possibly forever).  People forget that this can be a deadly disease and are selfish about how wearing a mask impacts on them as opposed to how wearing one protects others.  They are idiots.

@YouAreLobbyLud Almost unbelievable that people spout this rubbish. The selfishness, the entitlement, the arrogance and the ignorance. How clueless they are. They expect people with health conditions to remain isolated permanently so they can do what they want.
